alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:48AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Geauga, northeastern Cuyahoga and southwestern Lake Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 248 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cleveland Heights, or 8 miles east of Cleveland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chardon, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Highland Hills, Chesterland, Shaker Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights, Beachwood, Bedford Heights, Richmond Heights, Willoughby Hills and Highland Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
